name: BiteBank Websites
overview:
Online website CMS for Dentists.

BiteBank Websites Inc., a Toronto-based company. BiteBank Websites is an entrepreneurial team of dentists, web designers, IT experts, and investors who have created an award-winning application for dental practices to effortlessly and completely manage their web presence. BiteBank Websites was selected as the top new innovative product of 2011 by the world’s top dental supply and services company, Henry Schein (Canada).

BiteBank Websites offer a web-based interface for dentists to create, edit, or simply overhaul their practice website with the click of a mouse, all done in real time. Branding, communication, and patient education are all rolled into one. Pre-loaded content, social media, email accounts, newsletters, blogs, SEO, appointment tracking, mobile sites, hundreds of designs – we’ve got it all. No programming or graphics expertise is required. There is really nothing like it, as the dozens of testimonials from satisfied customers show.

We’ve signed dealer distribution agreement with top dental supply and services companies.

We’ve retained each and every dentist who signed up since our 2010 launch in Canada. That is an unsurpassable 100% retention rate. We have some of the top North American educators and speakers in dentistry now using our service

We have a dedicated R & D team that constantly innovates and develops new technologies into our proprietary application to improve the user experience. We offer a superior solution for a lower cost compared to our competition.
